Articles.Content:
I've finally started my very first mun base! it has a crew of 21 kerbals and i think it's pretty nice so far? although yet small, I will expand it in the future, and if you want i can keep you up to date with the developments .

I'm sure that some of you are going to say that they have base that are 20bilion times bigger, and okay that might be true and if you want then please post some pictures of them.

okay here come the pics!

AMEB (Advanced Munar Exploration Base) on launch pad, has a crew of 19

AMEB in flight

Somewhere inbetween i docked AMEB with my Vall-2 propulsion stage, here's a pic of the two docked together

I left the AMEB in orbit and launched a small recon unit, whom i then landed on the mun, it had 2 rovers one tipped over and was not recoverable, the other one is still functioning

I landed a better and faster rover for some more exploration before bringing in the AMEB, and discoverd this awesome ridge

Time to get the AMEB, here's a pic of it circularizing around the mun

Touchdown, time for a group picture

(1) without the recon crew

(2) with the recon crew and the MEV-1 (Munar Exploration Vehicle)

zooming out

if you want any additional info, just ask I will be more than happy to give it as long as i know what you are talking about. and btw i landed the AMEB just a tad to close to the recon craft (read practically on top off)

I hope you like it and

Greetings from Panzerknoef

Edited November 17, 2013 by panzerknoef
That's an impressive package for a 1st attempt. Well done.

That's an impressive package for a 1st attempt. Well done.

Thank you very much
